### Project description

The dataset contains national, regional, and global estimates of population access to different levels of drinking water, sanitation, and hygiene services. Data is disaggregated by year, location (urban/rural), and service level.

### Analysis goals

It allows for comparative and time-series analysis of WASH progress across countries, aligned with SDG 6 monitoring.

### Import

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

read_csv(here::here("data/raw/JMPdata.csv"))

```
